showScoreExcerpt: “The laughs are plentiful. Despite the incendiary issues lurking at the edges of his tale, ‘Just for Us’ is more focused on comedy than catharsis. Edelman is a master of callbacks, and his funniest jokes are accented with wonderful bulging eyes.”

more focused on comedy than catharsis
